dataformat.name: thrift
dataformat.title: Thrift
dataformat.description: Serialize and deserialize messages using Apache Thrift binary data format.
dataformat.label: dataformat,transformation

instanceClass.description: Name of class to use when unmarshalling

contentTypeFormat.description: Defines a content type format in which thrift message will be serialized/deserialized from(to) the Java been. The format can either be native or json for either native binary thrift, json or simple json fields representation. The default value is binary.

contentTypeHeader.description: Whether the data format should set the Content-Type header with the type from the data format. For example application/xml for data formats marshalling to XML, or application/json for data formats marshalling to JSON
